Sentencas: Since compact structure and centimeter size of solid-oxide fuel cell system equipped with micro gas turbine (SOFC-MGT), the heat of a micro radial-inflow turbine (RIT) is transferred to compressor through wall heat transfer.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: In this work, an integrated design method considering wall heat transfer was proposed to develop an efficient micro-RIT applied to c.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The one-dimensional design method considering wall heat transfer was established according to theoretical analysis and empirical correlations.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The geometric structure of micro-RIT was produced based on the distribution of blade angle, blade thickness and meridional streamline.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The structural parameters were optimized by three-dimensional numerical simulation of fluid-thermal-structural coupling to obtain the best geometric model of micro-RIT.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: A new test method was employed to verify the accuracy of the integrated design method.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The results indicate that the integrated design method under adiabatic condition and considering wall heat transfer have the same design accuracy for the mass flow of micro-RIT.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: However, compared with the integrated design method under adiabatic condition, the integrated design method considering wall heat transfer has better design accuracy for the efficiency of micro-RIT.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The maximum error of integrated design method under adiabatic condition is 3.53%, that of integrated design method considering wall heat transfer is 2.71%.
Titulo: Design and experiment study of a micro radial-flow turbine for a SOFC-MGT turbine hybrid system
